entry.title: Where is Joseph Russi?
entry.summary: For people trying to locate Joseph Russi — a former Douglas County homebuilder who left behind a trail of unfinished homes, unpaid loans, government fines and allegations of criminal activity — the search has become akin to chasing a ghost.

entry.title: Sutherlin FFA Shines at National FFA Convention: A Showcase of Excellence and Leadership
entry.summary: Every year in Indianapolis, Indiana, over 68,000 members attend the National FFA Convention. These members do numerous things such as attend workshops, compete, socialize and network with members from all over the country and attend career fairs.
